title: Realisation
creator_credit: Scott Percival, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Scott Percival thought he and his friends from Legacy were going to Perth for a little R&R. While he didn’t get the rest he’d hoped for, he got more than he could have imagined.
creator_credit_for_label: Scott Percival, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
